testCases.query: We need to decide between PostgreSQL and MongoDB for our user service. Document this as an ADR.
expectedBehavior: Creates ADR following Nygard template with numbered title (ADR-NNNN)
Includes Context section with problem statement and constraints
Documents Decision with specific actionable language
Documents at least 2 Alternatives Considered with rationale for rejection

testCases.query: We previously decided on REST (ADR-0003) but now want to move to GraphQL. Create an ADR that supersedes the old one.
expectedBehavior: Creates new ADR with next sequential number, does NOT edit ADR-0003
Sets Status to Proposed with reference to superseded ADR-0003
Explains why the original REST decision is being revisited
Documents the evolution context and new forces at play
Links back to ADR-0003 in References section

testCases.query: Fix the bug in our login endpoint that returns 500 when email is null
expectedBehavior: Claude does NOT invoke the architecture-decision-record skill
Treats this as a bug fix, not an architectural decision
Uses standard debugging and code editing tools instead
Does not create an ADR document
